item.title: Boroughs
item.description: ﬂ∑ This page lists completed articles on Vekllei’s boroughs ‚ö†Ô∏è This list is evolving, and will be expanded in future. Over the next year I’ll be completing this list of Vekllei’s 100 boroughs, and linking them to images and posts produced in the project. Vekllei’s five Crown Boroughs (once included) will be highlighted in bold. A Vekllei borough is an unusual administrative designation, portioned originally by a set of vague criteria that includes size, history, its unique geography, culture, and its spiritual value.
